highlights.triviaFact: Carlos Brathwaite hit 4 sixes off the final over to win the title
highlights.playerHighlight: Marlon Samuels scored a crucial 85*(66) in a pressure-packed final

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2021 - India vs Pakistan
highlights.triviaFact: Pakistan's historic first win against India in T20 World Cup history
highlights.playerHighlight: Shaheen Afridi's stunning spell of 3/31 including early Sharma and Rahul wickets

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2022 - India vs Pakistan
highlights.triviaFact: One of the greatest T20 chases ever witnessed at the MCG
highlights.playerHighlight: Virat Kohli's legendary 82*(53) - considered the best T20I innings ever

highlights.triviaFact: England demolished India's batting to reach the final
England won their second T20 World Cup title in dominant fashion
USA shocked Pakistan in a historic Super Over victory
India won their second T20 World Cup, ending an 11-year ICC trophy drought
highlights.playerHighlight: Virat Kohli's composed 76 in his T20I farewell

highlights.triviaFact: India defended 171 against England in a thriller
highlights.playerHighlight: Rohit Sharma's explosive 57(39) set the foundation

highlights.triviaFact: Afghanistan's maiden semi-final appearance in a World Cup

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2016 - SA vs ENG
highlights.triviaFact: One of the greatest T20 chases - England needed 229 and won with 2 balls to spare
highlights.playerHighlight: Joe Root's masterful 83(44) anchored the impossible chase

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8s - SA vs ENG
highlights.triviaFact: South Africa's bowlers restricted England to defend 163, securing a crucial Super 8 win
highlights.playerHighlight: Quinton de Kock's explosive 65(38) set up South Africa's competitive total

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2016 - SA vs WI
highlights.triviaFact: West Indies continued their march to the title with a gritty chase
highlights.playerHighlight: Marlon Samuels guided West Indies home with an unbeaten 44*(31)

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2021 - WI vs ENG
highlights.triviaFact: Defending champions West Indies were demolished for just 55 - their lowest T20I score
highlights.playerHighlight: Moeen Ali's 2/17 helped England bowl out West Indies in 14.2 overs

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2021 - WI vs SA
highlights.triviaFact: South Africa kept their semi-final hopes alive with a comprehensive win
highlights.playerHighlight: Anrich Nortje's pace was unplayable - 3/7 in 4 overs

highlights.matchContext: T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8s - WI vs SA
highlights.triviaFact: South Africa survived a scare to book their semi-final spot
highlights.playerHighlight: Tabraiz Shamsi's leg-spin troubled the West Indies batters - 3/27

defaultHighlight.triviaFact: A classic T20 World Cup encounter
